content:
I want to know the weather forecast for the next 14 days. Can you provide me with the temperature, dew point, relative humidity, pressure, wind speed and direction, rainfall, and symbol for each day?
Begin!

To begin the weather forecast for the next 14 days quest, I shall first identify the specific location for which you need the weather details. Once identification is completed, the appropriate data, including the required specifics such as temperature and wind speed for each of the 14 days, shall be retrieved.

I will initiate by understanding the perspective location requested either by city name or zip code. However, since there is no provided city name or the coordinates directly; I will need more input form user side about more detail (name or location -- longitude & latitude) to proceed. 
For now, let's start by listing all countries as a potential initial input by suggesting for which country the location might fall.

Calling list of all countries to guide the user further…

name: list_of_all_countries_for_weather_forecast_14_days
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'link': 'https://www.weatheronline.co.uk/about/Membership-Terms-of-Use.htm', 'modified': '2023-07-02T06:28:15Z', 'description': 'List of all countries with key definition', 'generator': 'https://www.weatheronline.co.uk', 'Countries': [{'COUNTRY': 'AF', 'name': 'Afghanistan'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AY', 'name': 'Alabama'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AK', 'name': 'Alaska'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AN', 'name': 'Albania'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AB', 'name': 'Alberta'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AL', 'name': 'Algeria'}, {'COUNTRY': 'ZM', 'name': 'American Samoa'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AD', 'name': 'Andorra'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AX', 'name': 'Angola'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AC', 'name': 'Antarctica'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AG', 'name': 'Argentina'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AZ', 'name': 'Arizona'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AR', 'name': 'Arkansas'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AM', 'name': 'Armenia'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AI', 'name': 'Atlantic Islands'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AU', 'name': 'Australia'}, {'COUNTRY': 'OS', 'name': 'Austria'}, {'COUNTRY': 'AS', 'name': 'Azerbaijan'}, {'COUNTRY': 'BA', 'name': 'Bahamas'}, {'COUNTRY'...

It seems that attempt to list all countries successfully provided a variety of location possibilities. Important step here is directing this information to you, so you can specify the exact local United States (state name) or international country from these available options mentioned: Afghanistan, Alabama, Alaska, Albania, Alberta, etc.

Now for better progress, could you specify the country/state of your interest, so we can move ahead towards searching for the city or try to get weather data for a definite location by filtering further more specifically? Please let me know either the country/state code or a direct city, zip code to zero in on your weather forecast needs!

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"Could you please specify the country/state name or provide a specific location’s city name or zip code so we can proceed with fetching detailed weather forecast data for the next 14 days?"}
function.name: Finish
